title: Login Issues (All Regions) - 12/7
body:
**[Update as of 12/8/2016]**:  This issue seems to be resolved now! If you're still experiencing login issues, please make your own discussion post in [**Help & Support.**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/osqw6G4M)

Hey guys!  There's currently a service issue where some players are unable to login to the client. 

Legacy client players may receive a RADS Error while attempting to login:
http://i.imgur.com/sbyxdNQ.png

Players on the updated client may see a connection issue notification.
http://i.imgur.com/yA9e8v3.jpg

Conditions have been improving and gradually allowing players to login, but we're not at 100% just yet.  In the meantime, we'll post updates here.  Hang tight!

replies.body:
**[Update as of 6:50PM PT]**

It looks like reports of this issue are starting to wind down. Some players have reported that [**performing a DNS Flush**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq10) has resolved this for them, so I recommend giving this a go if you're still experiencing this issue.
